imdb.title: Black Lagoon
imdb.plot: A Japanese businessman, captured by modern-day pirates, is written off and left for dead by his company. Tired of the corporate life, he opts to stick with the mercenaries that kidnapped him, becoming part of their gang.

episodes.title: The Vampire Twins Comen
episodes.plot: Mysterious killings of various gangsters are occurring in Roanapur. Hotel Moscow investigates the murders to take revenge, and bounty hunters from all over the world come to collect on the bounty Balalaika offers in Roanapur.

episodes.title: Bloodsport Fairytale
episodes.plot: Hotel Moscow finds out who the killers are, and sets up a trap for them. However, Revy and Eda have other plans that might cross paths with Hotel Moscow.

episodes.title: Swan Song at Dawn
episodes.plot: Balalaika exacts her revenge against the killers, even as one seeks the aid of the Lagoon Company.

episodes.title: Greenback Jane
episodes.plot: A fugitive counterfeiter named Jane arrives at the Church of Violence, hoping to find shelter. When the bullets start flying, prayer probably won't help - but Revy and Eda might.

episodes.title: The Roanapur Freakshow Circus
episodes.plot: The bounty hunters arrive at Jane's motel, and she escapes due to preparations Eda had made beforehand. Jane sees Eda and agrees to pay any price if Eda saves her. Eda and Revy force the bounty hunters to retreat and begin heading to the Black Lagoon. When Russel arrives at the scene, Shenhua demands more money since Eda and Revy are involved. Eda's plan to escape on the Black Lagoon is stymied since Dutch and Benny took it on a job, and they are forced to wait in the Lagoon Company dock house. They are attacked by the bounty hunters, who surround the building. As ...

episodes.title: Mr. Benny's Good Fortune
episodes.plot: Shenhua evades the trap, but is shot by Eda after Revy acts as a decoy. On the roof, Rock and Jane are confronted by Sawyer, but she goes into shock after losing her ultra voice in an explosion. As the building collapses, Dutch and Benny return to port, and Revy, Eda, Jane, and Rock jump onto the boat along with several of the bounty hunters. Dutch begins using evasive maneuvers to cause the bounty hunters to fall off the boat, and Revy dispatches the remaining bounty hunters except Russel, who manages to make it to the engine room, where he is confronted by Eda. ...

episodes.title: Fujiyama Gangsta Paradise
episodes.plot: Rock and Revy join Balalaika on a trip to Japan, where she agrees to take sides in a feud between warring yakuza clans.

episodes.title: The Succession
episodes.plot: Balalaika continues making waves in the Japanese underworld. Meanwhile, Rock has another encounter with Yukio - and learns that she is heavily involved with one of the clashing yakuza families.

episodes.title: Two Father's Little Soldier Girls
episodes.plot: Balalaika reminisces on her past, recalling that she intended to enter the Olympic rifle shooting event in Moscow 1980 to restore the reputation of her father, and found herself at the front lines in the Soviet war in Afghanistan. Following the war, she and the soldiers formerly under her command joined the Russian Mafia. Yukio severs her ties with her former life by staying late at school with her friend Maki, then being picked up by her henchmen despite Maki's pleas. the new head of the Washimine Group, Yukio orders a counterattack at Hotel Moscow, and Ginji leads ...

episodes.title: The Dark Tower
episodes.plot: Revy and Ginji unleash on Chaka with brutal force, allowing Rock to grab Yukio and escape. The next day, Balalaika begins the next stage of her plan to violently eliminate the Washimine Group.

episodes.title: Snow White's Payback
episodes.plot: Yukio takes action to stop the systematic destruction of the Washimine Group. Later, after Rock confronts Balalaika about her ruthless campaign of violence against Yukio, he suddenly finds himself at gunpoint.

episodes.title: The Gunslingers
episodes.plot: The body count rises as Rock takes desperate measures to force Yukio into giving up on crime. But with so much blood already spilled, it might be too late for her to return to a peaceful, normal life.

episodes.title: The Black Lagoon
episodes.plot: A Japanese businessman, Rokuro Okajima, finds himself in the grasp of a mercenary group known as Black Lagoon. They have captured him in order to take a disk of company secrets that he was transporting. The company responds to the capture by sending a 'military for hire' after them to eliminate him and the disk.

episodes.title: Mangrove Heaven
episodes.plot: The Lagoon - the mercenaries' PT boat - is chased into a river by the military forces, which are chasing primarily in an attack helicopter. It seems the lightly-armed Lagoon has no chance against the helicopter, but Rokuro formulates a plan involving the boat's torpedoes and a partially-sunken ship lodged in the river canal. After defeating the helicopter, the Black Lagoon brings Rokuro to the realization that he has been written off by his former employer. He elects to stay with the mercenaries, who start to call him by the nickname 'Rock'.

episodes.title: Ring-Ding Ship Chase
episodes.plot: Roanapur is the south Pacific city in which the Black Lagoon operates as 'Lagoon Trading Company', and in which many crime syndicates operate. One of the crime lords, Mr. Chin, takes exception to his former colleague Dutch (leader of Black Lagoon) working for the Russian mafia, Hotel Moscow, operated by a former Soviet military officer known only as Balalaika. To that end, Chin sends a pirate gang after the Black Lagoon while they are at sea. Through gun-woman Revy's skills, Lagoon defeats the pirate gang, and back in Roanapur, Balalaika personally takes care of Mr. ...

episodes.title: Die Rückkehr des Adlers
episodes.plot: The Lagoon Company is hired by a collector of Nazi art to recover a painting from a sunken German U-boat. Revy and Rock descend to the U-boat in scuba gear, while the Black Lagoon is attacked by neo-nazis on the surface.

episodes.title: Eagle Hunting and Hunting Eagles
episodes.plot: Dutch and Benny are kept at bay by the neo-Nazi ship on the surface, having to dodge a series of TOW missiles, while Rock and Revy continue to fight the intruders both inside the downed sub and underwater.

episodes.title: Moonlit Hunting Grounds
episodes.plot: Dutch takes Revy over to the neo-Nazi ship in order to finish the fight. Revy, incensed by Rock's actions in the previous episode - where he restrained her from going into a definitely suicidal battle with the undersea attackers - goes on a killing spree. Dutch stops her just before she gets to the innocent hired crew of the ship, and straightens her out. Finding the boss of the neo-Nazis, he then discovers that the man who hired him is a Nazi himself, and hired both him and the neo-Nazi group to recover the painting and test the neo-Nazi group's competence. When the ...

episodes.title: Calm Down, Two Men
episodes.plot: Dutch sends Rock on errands around Roanapur - mainly collecting on owed bills and such - and orders Revy to accompany him. Revy gives Rock grief about his conduct, saying he's not able to hack this life and should go back to Japan. Rock finally snaps and chews Revy out about her attitude, and in return, she tries to shoot him at point-blank range. The police come in response to the ruckus being raised in the center of town, and arrest both of them - though it will be only symbolic, as the police are corrupt and in league with all the syndicates anyway. In the police ...

episodes.title: Rasta Blasta
episodes.plot: Lagoon is hired to deliver a package, consisting of a boy - the son of a high-profile Venezuelan crime family. Colombian crime lords in Roanapur find that he is in the city and try to take him out, but his maid/bodyguard Roberta arrives in town at that point. Lagoon arrives at their favorite watering hole - a bar called Yellowflag - just as Roberta confronts the Colombian mob inside.

episodes.title: Maid to Kill
episodes.plot: The maid Roberta starts destroying Yellowflag, and everyone in it. In the ensuing battle, Revy is knocked unconscious. Lagoon flees, and the boy, Garcia, goes with them, being afraid of the violent person his maid and friend Roberta has become. Roberta pursues, her methods quite reminiscent of the Terminator (and remarked as such by Rock during the chase).

episodes.title: The Unstoppable Chambermaid
episodes.plot: Revy finally regains consciousness and enters into combat with Roberta. The battle is violent, and very balanced at the same time, neither woman gaining the upper hand. Balalaika arrives, surrounding the group with a small army, forcing an end to the fight - for a moment - while she exposits that Roberta is actually an elite ex-resistance fighter from a group of South American rebels. Balalaika strips the duo of their weapons, and they go at it with their fists. This is again interrupted when Garcia begs for Roberta to stop, and he will go home with her.

episodes.title: Lock 'n' Load Revolution
episodes.plot: Chang, leader of the Hong Kong triad, comes to Lagoon wanting their assistance transporting some documents belonging to anti-US terrorists - which Chang recovered and is selling to US interests. Rock and Revy are enlisted to do the job, and are supposed to rendezvous with another group - Shenhua, a Taiwanese assassin, and her partner Leigharch, a drug-dealing European man - on an island in the Philippines. Upon their arrival there, Rock ends up captured by the terrorist group, who got to he and Revy just before Shenhua and her colleague arrived.

episodes.title: Guerrillas in the Jungle
episodes.plot: Season finale. Rock is interrogated by a Japanese man involved with the terrorist group. Revy, entering into a partnership with Shenhua, despite the fact she can barely tolerate the woman, makes plans to raid the terrorist camp and recover Rock. A tremendous battle ensues, with the entire terrorist group chasing the foursome all the way up to the de-militarized zone where the CIA is waiting for the papers. As they arrive, Rock realizes with a panic that the briefcase he'd been carrying was left behind in the terrorist stronghold. Revy tells him not to worry, and pulls...
